mapper.update: UPDATE ems_profession2subject ps LEFT JOIN ems_profession p ON ps.professionId_n = p.professionId_n SET ps.active_c = 'F' WHERE p.facultyId_n = #{facultyId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ps.active_c = 'A'

UPDATE ems_profession2subject ps LEFT JOIN ems_subject s ON ps.subjectId_n = s.subjectId_n SET ps.active_c = 'P' WHERE ps.professionId_n = #{professionId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND (ps.active_c = 'A' OR ps.active_c = 'F')
UPDATE ems_profession2subject ps LEFT JOIN ems_subject s ON ps.subjectId_n = s.subjectId_n SET ps.active_c = 'B' WHERE ps.professionId_n = #{professionId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ps.active_c = 'S'
UPDATE ems_profession2subject ps LEFT JOIN ems_profession p ON ps.professionId_n = p.professionId_n SET ps.active_c = 'A' WHERE p.facultyId_n = #{facultyId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ps.active_c = 'F'
UPDATE ems_profession2subject SET active_c = 'A' WHERE professionId_n = #{professionId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
